thread.title: The 2018 Toyota RAV4 Adventure is ready for... adventure, duh - Roadshow
thread.title_full: The 2018 Toyota RAV4 Adventure is ready for... adventure, duh - Roadshow

title: The 2018 Toyota RAV4 Adventure is ready for... adventure, duh - Roadshow
text:
1 of 20 The 2018 Toyota RAV4 Adventure is ready for... adventure, duh 
Toyota's new RAV4 Adventure for the 2018 model year is aimed squarely at young, active families. Photo by: Andrew Krok/Roadshow Pricing is currently unavailable. To improve its off-road capabilities, the Adventure model's ride height is a half-inch higher than the regular RAV4. Photo by: Andrew Krok/Roadshow Pricing is currently unavailable. 
To be better equipped to tow light loads, the RAV4 Adventure gets a standard tow prep package that adds an upgraded radiator and additional engine oil and transmission fluid coolers. Photo by: Andrew Krok/Roadshow Pricing is currently unavailable. Photo by: Andrew Krok/Roadshow Pricing is currently unavailable. Photo by: Andrew Krok/Roadshow Pricing is currently unavailable. 
The cabin is dressed with unique trim pieces, Adventure door sills, all-weather floor and cargo mats and a leather-wrapped shift knob. Photo by: Andrew Krok/Roadshow Pricing is currently unavailable. 
For an additional power source when you're camping out in the middle of nowhere, a 120-volt power outlet is standard in the cargo area. Photo by: Andrew Krok/Roadshow Pricing is currently unavailable. 
If you're in the market for a compact crossover that's a bit better suited for a weekend expedition out of the city but aren't super hardcore, the 2018 Toyota RAV4 Adventure goes on sale in September. Click through for a bunch more photos from the Chicago Auto Show 2017 .
